import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; const Login = ({setIsLoggedIn, isLoggedIn}) => { const [newUser, setNewUser] = useState(false) return ( isLoggedIn === false ? (
{/* if creating new user, then print this field ---> */}

New User? { setNewUser(true) console.log(newUser) }} />

{/* otherwise we are signed up already and need this one --> */}
) : null ) } export default Login
